entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XmlSerializer Creation throws FileNotFoundException #8322
  • SwipeItem command not executed #8315
  • Editor Sizing Options Do Not Work on Android #8313
  • Android Switch Issue (App ThemeBinding wont update) #8312
  • Shell Flyout is Blank When Entry is Clicked First #8311
  • Button Pressed VisualState not Reverting #8309
  • Can't enable Keychain on entitlements.plist #8308
  • [Blazor] Update templates to include a message in the app when the browser version is too old #8307
  • Shell badges #8305
  • Can't publish a Maui app that references a class library on Windows without modifying the project #8304
  • [Android] [Entry] Keyboard is still shown after return/done action #8302
  • .net Maui iOS BundleResource Missing / Not Working #8301
  • Single project iOS Service Extensions #8299
  • ContentPage's OnBackButtonPressed not invoked on iOS and MacCatalyst #8296
  • Can't Change ToolbarItem FontIconSource Glyph After Load #8295

Closed

  • ChainReact.NET: Low-code reactivity framework for .NET #8320
  • Resizetizer has an empty error with an invalid file name #7554
    6.0-sr2
  • Cannot programmatically set focus to Button on MacCatalyst #6786
    6.0-sr2
  • [GridLayoutManager] if IGridLayout.Width/Height was valid, `ArrangeChildren` was not properly working #7681
    6.0-sr2
  • DynamicResource TextColor doesn't work on labels with formatted string #7464
    6.0-sr2
  • SearchBar background not changing on iOS #6555
    6.0-sr2
  • [mauipalooza] ImageButton isn't clipping on Android #5948
    6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] No Background is rendered on Borders with Shadows #7015
    6.0-sr2
  • The indicatorView render outside of border #7493
    6.0-sr2
  • Border does not clip when stroke shape is provided in iOS and maccatalyst #7475
    6.0-sr2
  • Rendering problem with FlexLayout / BindableLayout when insert/remove to binded collection #8289
  • .net 7 preview workaround: .net 6.0.300 might not be installed when VS preview is installed, the wiki needs to be fixed. #8288

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround VS Bug with using dotnet 7 workloads #8316
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix Entry decoration using a custom Background #8310
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr3
  • [Tizen] Update resizetizer for Tizen #8298
    area/single project ☝️, platform/tizen, .NET 7

Merged

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20220624213015570 to loc #8319
  • [build] set $DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP to 0 #8317
  • [Android] Avoid load icon if menu item is disposed #8280
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢, fatal
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 7 #8287
  • Don't wrap exceptions raised from SetVirtualView #8290
    6.0-sr2
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8294
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2

Updated

  • [net7] include net6 templates #8203
    area/setup 🪄, area/templates 📄, .NET 7
  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Copy MAUI to bin when SefContained=False #8285
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, 6.0-sr2
  • Add Debug logger to MAUI templates #8180
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Fix RadioButton DefaultTemplate #8292
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
